title: When is it necessary to change technology that is functional? - Quora

response.answer_text: Changing technology is a difficult subject. It can be very disruptive and expensive. I am of the “If it ain’t broke, don’t fix it” school—here is my list of things that prompt me to change technology: The current system capacity is expected to be exceeded soon.Maintenance of the old system is becoming too expensive. This can be lack of available parts or expertise.New systems offer significant increased function or cost savings.The components are no longer supported. At some point, the maker will discontinue updates to the OS or other software. This can leave you open to security issues.
